input.sentences: i went to this promotion event for 888.com .
there were some promotion girls that looked like they were straight from a vegas performance .
there were actually poker | bridge and other table games going on .
here 's another view of the table .
i finally got a picture of myself with my mom . we had a lot of fun .
output.sentences: The town decided to put on a promotion to help build a new community center, and the event was called 888.
The Vegas theme was straight out of Ocean's 11, and the promotion was such a success.
There were craps tables, poker, slots, and other fun games for people to enjoy.
I got a great view of the craps table, where I was next to my parents.
I got a picture with the George Clooney cut out, and while I was taking pictures, my mom won at craps, and got a lot of money raised!
